title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Lockington
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: Interviews with residents, groups and local business owners of Lockington, Shire of Campaspe. Filmed as five short documentaries as part of Memory and Place, also known as ACMI in the regions.
description: Interviews with residents, groups and business owners of Lockington, Shire of Campaspe. These five short documentaries look at life in Lockington from different perspectives, covering local businesses, the Lockington Living Heritage Complex, a young girl growing up in Lockington, the experiences of a group of women and the Lockington Hotel, where the locals come to meet and enjoy local music at night.
